members.signatureBeforeChange: int getCaretOffsetAtX(String line, int lineOffset, int lineXOffset)
members.signatureAfterChange: int getCaretOffsetAtX(String line, int lineOffset, int lineXOffset)
diff: -		int x = textWidth(line, lineOffset, 0, offset, styles, 0, gc);
